properties.verseOrder: v1 c1 v2 v1 c2 e1

verse.name: v1a
verse.lines:
We call upon Your name O Lord
The name that is holy
We call upon Your name O Lord
The name that is holy (repeat)

verse.name: v1b
verse.lines:
We call upon Your name O Lord
We come to bring our praise to the One
Who was Who is and is to come

verse.name: c1a
verse.lines:
Arise King of kings
God of all creation
O Lord we cry we cry

verse.name: c1b
verse.lines:
Arise King of kings
The Father to the nations
The Rock of our salvation
O God arise

verse.name: v2
verse.lines:
We call upon Your name O Lord
The name that is holy
We call upon Your name O Lord
The name that is holy

verse.name: c2a
verse.lines:
Arise King of kings
God of all creation
O Lord we cry - we cry - we cry

verse.name: c2b
verse.lines:
Arise King of kings
The Father to the nations
The Rock of our salvation
We cry we cry
Arise King of kings
God of all creation
O Lord we cry
Arise King of kings
The Father to the nations
The Rock of our salvation

verse.name: e1
verse.lines:
O God arise O God arise
O God arise O God arise
O God arise O God arise
O God arise O God arise
